info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 2:55PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL CABARRUS... SOUTHEASTERN MECKLENBURG AND NORTH CENTRAL UNION COUNTIES THROUGH 330 PM EDT... At 255 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Uptown Charlotte, or near Matthews, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Matthews, Mint Hill, Indian Trail, Stallings, Lake Park, Hemby Bridge, Fairview In Union County, Unionville, East Charlotte, and Harrisburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
